comments: good teacher, good class. not very helpful as she refuses to learn how to use the school email, and doesnt answer private emails. she basically read the book every lecture, but you don\'t really need it to do the essays. highly recommend.
This is my second class with her. She is an awesome teacher! A lot of memorization for her tests.. She tells you what to study for! I highly recommend. Need to be there to take notes!!

GREAT TEACHER! Will be taking her again. Need to be there and take notes. She is clear and will make sure you understand the subject! Tests multiple choice, T/F, & essay. Gives extra credit.. I highly recommend her!
Loved this class. She is very helpful! Test were easy, if you study.. I recommend her for any ADJ class!! Gives extra credit.

Super funny teaher! Tests are a piece of cake! She tells you all the questions (word for word) that will appear on the test... most of the time including the answers. so STUDY THEM and you cant go wrong! It was one of the funnest classes i\'ve taken and it was one i learned the most from. Wish she taught all the ADJ classes.
She is a wonderful teacher! she is very funny and has great stories to say! This class was easy. One major paper. ANd 3 tests and extra credit. It was fun taking her class.
Great teacher! Extremely helpful ad willing to work with students. If you show up for class there is no way you can pass!
